content.title: <RichColor Color="1,0.5,0,1">Welcome to Arktic</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">We aim to stay true to the game with just slightly boosted rates, no excessive or game breaking mods, and no player or dino level alterations. We still want to feel the grind and work for the PVE progression.</>


<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">We hope you enjoy your stay here!</> <RichColor Color="1,0,0,0.8"><3</>

content.title: <RichColor Color="1,0.2,0,1">Server Rates:</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Max Wild Dino Lvl: 150 / 180Tek</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">x3 XP (x4 on events)</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">x3 Taming/Harvesting/Gathering (x4 on Events)</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">x5 Breeding/Mating (x6 on event)</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">x5 Larger item stacks</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Stacked prime fish meat/prime meat/mutton/honey</>

content.title: <RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">Server Rules:</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">o</> <RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Be respectful - No harassment, hate speech, or toxic behavior, and</> ask before <RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">demolishing bases.</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">o</> <RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">No griefing, base spam, or resource blocking.</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">o</> <RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Traps must be unlocked for public use or removed after use.</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">o</> <RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Use an appropriate in-game name (no "Human", no slurs).</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">o</> <RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Please change your Discord nickname to show your in-game name.</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">o</> <RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Discord is required — all applications and updates happen here.</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">o</><RichColor Color="1,1,1,1"> New players must submit an application before joining.</>

content.title: <RichColor Color="0.6,0.1,0,1">Welcome to the Donation info!</>
content.text:
We run this cluster because we love ARK and enjoy playing it with good people. Playing will always be free — but hosting isn’t, so we hugely appreciate any support!

Donations help with:
<RichColor Color="1,0.5,0,1">o</> Hardware (RAM, CPU cooling, storage, repairs, future upgrades)
<RichColor Color="1,0.5,0,1">o</> Network & Power (internet bandwidth, static IP, electricity — the server runs 24/7)
<RichColor Color="1,0.5,0,1">o</> Maintenance (keeping the ARKs alive and running smoothly)

We're not a big community and cover most of the costs ourselves, so even a small donation makes a real difference.

No pressure, but if you enjoy your time here and want to help keep the ARKs alive, we’d be truly grateful.

If you have any questions, feel free to message <RichColor Color="1,0.5,0,1">@the.pizza</> on <RichColor Color="0,0,0,1">discord.</>

No pressure, but if you enjoy your time here and want to help keep the ARKs alive, we’d be truly grateful.

Press <RichColor Color="0.6,0.1,0,1">Donate</> below and follow the instructions.


See you around! <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1"><3</>

Sincerely, 
<RichColor Color="1,0.5,0,1">Pizza</>
